description.en: Investment-Attractive Plot with High Development Potential! The plot is located in a promising area, close to the sea and major cities. It is ideally suited for long-term investments and development projects. If purchased in full, the land can be divided into 18 individual plots. After subdivision, the estimated value of each plot is around 2 million TRY. The timeframe for completing all legal and administrative procedures is approximately 6 months. Don't miss the opportunity to invest in land with high growth potential and profitability!

Investment-Attractive Plot with High Development Potential! The plot is located in a promising area, close to the sea and major cities. It is ideally suited for long-term investments and development projects. The estimated timeframe for completing all legal and administrative procedures is approximately 6 months. Don‚Äôt miss the opportunity to invest in land with strong growth potential!

An investment plot in the village of Aydogan with a total area of 10,700 m¬≤ is offered for 25 million Turkish lira. The land can be divided into 45 individual plots, each of which can potentially be sold for approximately 1 million lira. If all plots are sold, the expected return is around 45 million lira. The property is located in a promising area with high growth and development potential. This is an excellent opportunity for investors interested in profitable and long-term investments.

A plot with permission for eco-tourism development within Istanbul ‚Äì by the sea and surrounded by nature! A unique investment opportunity in one of the most promising sectors ‚Äî eco-tourism. üìç The plot is located within the city limits of Istanbul, close to the sea and in a picturesque natural setting. üí∞ Price per square meter ‚Äî 6,500 TRY üè° Possibility to build 8 to 10 bungalows üíº Ideal for launching an eco-tourism project or for quick resale with profit. Similar plots in the area are being sold at prices starting from 10,000 TRY per m¬≤, making this offer particularly advantageous. Don‚Äôt miss the chance to invest in a high-demand project with strong growth potential!

Spacious 2+1 Apartment with Separate Kitchen and En-Suite Bathroom ‚Äì Prime Central Location! This well-maintained 90 m¬≤ apartment features a separate kitchen, central water purification system, enclosed glass balcony, and a private en-suite bathroom. Ideally located just steps from the health clinic, pharmacy, bus stop, and hospital. The municipality building and MarkAntalya shopping mall are within walking distance. The property is clean, well-kept, and ready to move in ‚Äì perfect for comfortable city living or investment.

Fully furnished 3+1 apartment for sale in Lara. All furniture and appliances are brand new and under warranty, including 3 A++ air conditioners, fridge, dishwasher, and washing machine. Equipped with Creavit bathroom furniture, Bosch built-in kitchen appliances, electric fireplace, designer curtains, and a glass-enclosed balcony with furniture. The building offers open parking, disabled-accessible elevator, and 24/7 security cameras. High-quality construction with thermal and sound insulation, and natural gas at the doorstep. Excellent location: 3 minutes to the city center, 15 minutes to both Konyaaltƒ± and Lara beaches.

Prime location just 20 meters from Kleopatra Beach! This modern 1+1 apartment is in a new building and offers 46 m¬≤ net (52 m¬≤ gross) living space, with an open-plan kitchen, balcony, and 1 bathroom. The building features an elevator and open parking. Exceptional location with everything nearby ‚Äî sea, shops, restaurants, and walking paths. A perfect choice for holiday living, rental income, or seaside lifestyle!

Brand-new 3+1 apartment (85 m¬≤ net, 115 m¬≤ gross) located on the 1st floor of a 15-storey building, right next to the Bostancƒ± metro station ‚Äî directly above the ‚ÄúSalon Model‚Äù hairdresser. The residence features open and closed parking, underfloor heating, generator, water tank, and two elevators. High-quality materials include √áanakkale ceramics, Vitra concealed cistern, Artema faucets, and √áamsan laminate flooring. A perfect choice for living or investment in one of Istanbul‚Äôs most accessible neighborhoods!

Spacious and well-maintained 3+1 apartment offering 145 m¬≤ gross (135 m¬≤ net) of comfortable living space, located on the 3rd floor of a 4-story building. The property features a separate closed kitchen, two bathrooms, natural gas combi heating system, a large balcony, elevator, and secure underground parking. Situated in a clean and quiet building, this unfurnished home is owner-occupied and ready for its new residents. Ideal for families looking for a functional, peaceful, and central living space.

This premium 3+1 ground-floor apartment offers 170 m¬≤ gross (150 m¬≤ net) of refined living space with first-class materials throughout, including full marble flooring in common areas, laminate parquet in bedrooms, and floor-to-ceiling marble in all three bathrooms (including one en-suite). Featuring panoramic floor-to-ceiling windows, Viessmann inverter air conditioners in every room, a spacious closed kitchen, ECA combi boiler and natural gas system, a large balcony and terrace, LED and spot lighting, custom-built wardrobes and storage units, and a private 6 m¬≤ locked storage room in the basement. The property also includes a sheltered private parking space and a green, tree-lined front garden. Located just 3 minutes from the beach and within walking distance to Atat√ºrk Park (500 m), Varyant Terrace (600 m), Kalei√ßi Old Town (1.5 km), Beach Park (1.2 km), MarkAntalya Mall (1.9 km), tram station (150 m), and Y√ºz√ºnc√º Yƒ±l Avenue (50 m). A rare opportunity combining central location, design, and comfort!

Well-maintained and fully furnished 2+1 apartment with a separate kitchen, located on the 3rd floor of a 3-story building. The property features 88 m¬≤ gross (73 m¬≤ net) living space, 2 balconies ‚Äî one of which is large and enclosed with glass ‚Äî and private access to a 90 m¬≤ rooftop terrace. It has a natural gas stove heating system, 2 air conditioners, and comes fully equipped with all white goods (dishwasher, washing machine, combi boiler, refrigerator, microwave, oven, stove, extractor fan, TV) and IKEA furniture exactly as shown in the photos. The building has its own open parking area, a low monthly maintenance fee of just 200 TL, and is close to a tram line providing easy access to the airport. A weekly open-air market is set up nearby every Friday, and the historic city center is just a 15-minute walk away. Ideal for both living and investment!

This property is located in one of the most central and prestigious areas of Istanbul ‚Äì Be≈üikta≈ü. It is currently leased by Be≈üikta≈ü Sports Club with a rental agreement valid until 2027. The current monthly rental income is 600,000 TL. After the contract ends, the location offers excellent potential due to its high visibility and prime position.

RENOVATED COMFORTABLE 2+1 APARTMENT FOR SALE IN LARA GUZELOBA AREA OF ANTALYA. IT IS WALKING DISTANCE TO TRANSPORTATION AND MARKETS. DUE TO ITS LOCATION, IT OFFERS ALL THE FACILITIES THAT CAN MEET YOUR YOUR NEEDS. THE APARTMENT IS SUITABLE FOR SALE TO FOREIGN CITIZENS. THE AREA IS OPEN FOR OBTAINING A RESIDENCE PERMIT IN TURKEY.

Although originally designed as a 5+1 layout, our villa has been upgraded to a 7+1 with two additional year-round rooms enclosed with glass balcony systems (Pimapen) ‚Äî one facing the road and one overlooking the pool. At the back, a 12 m¬≤ poolside living space has been created with a split air conditioner, offering a cool retreat in the summer right after your swim, and a warm, cozy view of the pool in winter. An automatic cleaning and chemical dosing robot has been added to the pool, so while you relax, the pool maintains itself. The villa offers the unique luxury of enjoying both a private sauna and a swimming pool. Hot water is provided by solar energy in the summer and a Siemens instant water heater in the winter. A covered parking area for three vehicles keeps your cars protected from the sun, and a Mercedes Wallbox offers charging for electric vehicles. Each of the seven rooms is equipped with air conditioning, ensuring a cool summer and warm winter environment. Supported by a powerful 40 kW AKSA generator, the villa offers uninterrupted electricity supply.

This stunning 344 m¬≤ triplex villa offers luxurious living with a 5+1 layout and exceptional design details. Featuring a separate main kitchen as well as a second kitchen on the top floor, the home includes a spacious island kitchen fully equipped with premium built-in Franke appliances: dishwasher, hob, oven, extractor fan, and microwave. Each of the five bedrooms comes with its own en-suite bathroom, and two of the bedrooms have private walk-in closets. Comfort is ensured year-round with Mitsubishi VRF air conditioning system, Rehau underfloor heating, and an energy-efficient heat pump. For ultimate relaxation, the villa includes a private sauna, jacuzzi, built-in TV unit, and a 32 m¬≤ private swimming pool. An elevator provides easy access across all floors. This villa is a rare opportunity for those seeking modern comfort, cutting-edge technology, and elegant living in a private setting.

This spacious and well-designed 3+1 duplex apartment with an open-plan (American-style) kitchen offers a total gross area of 167 m¬≤ and a net usable area of 118 m¬≤. Located on the 2nd (top) floor of a 2-storey building aged between 5 and 10 years, the property features a bright living area, three bedrooms, two bathrooms, a balcony, and air conditioning for heating/cooling. The residential complex offers excellent amenities including both open and closed parking, a swimming pool, 24/7 security, and an elevator. Ideally situated in a desirable location, this home is perfect for both comfortable living and as a solid investment opportunity.

A spacious and well-maintained 3+1 apartment is for sale, located on the 2nd floor of a 6-story building that is only 4 years old. Offering a net area of 110 m¬≤, the property features a separate (closed) kitchen, a balcony, natural gas heating with a combi boiler, and both open and closed parking options. The building is equipped with an elevator. With its bright interior and functional layout, this apartment is an excellent choice for families or as an investment. Enjoy a peaceful and modern lifestyle in a well-located and well-kept residence.

This spacious 2+1 apartment is ideally located right next to Opera Ya≈üam Hospital, in the very heart of the district ‚Äî just steps from major supermarkets, pharmacies, the lively Wednesday market, and the Old Industrial Zone. MarkAntalya Shopping Mall is only 5 minutes away, and main transportation routes are within 3 minutes. The apartment is part of a well-maintained building with an elevator and offers a rare private parking area for 6‚Äì7 cars. It features a Viessmann brand condensing natural gas combi boiler for efficient heating, separate bathroom, toilet, and kitchen areas, along with two large balconies ‚Äî both fitted with full glass enclosures. With security cameras operating 24/7 around the site, the property offers both comfort and peace of mind. A small margin for price negotiation is available. If requested fully furnished, the price will vary accordingly.

This brand-new 5+1 triplex villa offers a spacious net area of 190 m¬≤ (240 m¬≤ gross), providing modern comfort and functionality across three floors. Featuring an open-plan American kitchen, two bathrooms, and climate control for heating and cooling, the villa is ideal for large families or those seeking extra living space. The layout is designed to maximize natural light and usability, with generous room sizes and smart design throughout. With its zero age and modern construction, this villa presents an excellent opportunity for both residential living and long-term investment.

A fully furnished 2+1 apartment with 90 m¬≤ net (100 m¬≤ gross) living space, just 350 meters from the sea! Located on the 1st floor of a modern 5-story building that is only 3 years old, this property offers comfort, functionality, and a prime coastal location. It features underfloor heating, a separate closed kitchen, a spacious balcony, and one bathroom. The apartment is situated in a building with an elevator and has access to open parking. With its proximity to the beach and peaceful surroundings, it is an ideal home for both permanent residence and holiday living.

A fully furnished 2+1 duplex apartment located on the 4th and 5th floors in the heart of Alanya, just 600 meters from the famous Cleopatra Beach. This 125 m¬≤ south-facing property offers breathtaking and uninterrupted sea and mountain views, guaranteed to remain unobstructed due to zoning. The apartment features 2 bathrooms, 1 terrace, and 1 balcony‚Äîideal for enjoying the Mediterranean climate. The building includes excellent on-site facilities: outdoor swimming pool, sauna, fitness center, children‚Äôs playground, gazebo and BBQ area, 2 elevators, generator, and open parking. Perfect for both residential living and a holiday home in a prime coastal location.

This spacious duplex apartment is located on the 4th and 5th floors of a building with an elevator, in a quiet yet very central area of Alanya. Just a 3-minute walk from the beach and 8 minutes from Alanya Harbour, the apartment offers convenient access to restaurants, supermarkets, and shops‚Äîall within walking distance. The two-level property features two shower rooms, a main bedroom with a double bed, and an additional room with a sofa bed. A large open-plan kitchen, dining, and living area opens to three balconies‚Äîtwo with partial sea views and one with stunning mountain views. The apartment includes high-quality built-in wardrobes, two TVs, a washing machine, and a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge/freezer, microwave, stove, and dishwasher. All windows are fitted with electric shutters. The building offers excellent communal amenities, including a large furnished area on the ground floor with a sauna, toilet, and an outdoor pool equipped with sun loungers and umbrellas. Additional features include a secure bicycle parking area and a backup power generator.

A brand-new 1+1 apartment on the 2nd floor of a modern 10-story building. With a net area of 40 m¬≤ and a gross area of 46 m¬≤, this apartment offers a functional open-plan kitchen and living space, a comfortable bedroom, a bathroom, and a balcony. The property is equipped with air conditioning for year-round comfort. The building features an elevator and open parking area. Perfect for investment or personal use, this apartment is ideal for those seeking modern living in a well-maintained complex.

Located in the heart of Alanya, just steps away from the bus station, main bazaar, shops, and all city amenities! Literally across the street from the famous Damlata≈ü Beach ‚Äî a prime and highly sought-after location. This apartment has been fully renovated from scratch with high-quality materials and modern finishes, making it truly unique compared to other units in the complex. Perfect both for comfortable year-round living and as a high-return investment property. Don‚Äôt miss out on this exceptional opportunity!

This spacious 2+1 apartment (145 m¬≤ gross / 140 m¬≤ net) is located on the elevated ground floor of a well-maintained 5-story building. The property is fully furnished, unoccupied, and move-in ready. It features an open-plan (American style) kitchen, 2 bathrooms, a balcony, and is equipped with air conditioning for both heating and cooling. The building offers an elevator, 24/7 camera security, and both open and covered parking options.

This exceptional luxury duplex villa in Kalkan offers both investment potential and serene Mediterranean living ‚Äì just a 2-minute drive from the beach. The property consists of two floors. The ground floor features a private-entry 1+1 apartment (60 m¬≤), which can be used as a guest house, storage space, or commercial unit. The main duplex includes an open-plan kitchen and living room, one bedroom, and a terrace with a private infinity pool and stunning sea views. The upper floor hosts a master bedroom with a jacuzzi and heated indoor pool, a second bedroom, a Turkish hammam, sauna, and a shared bathroom. Each of the three bedrooms has its own private en-suite bathroom. Sold fully furnished with all white goods, the villa is beautifully designed to offer both comfort and style ‚Äî simply bring your suitcase and start enjoying!

Located in the heart of Kalkan, this exquisite villa offers both comfort and rich amenities within a secure and serene residential complex. The site features a semi-Olympic swimming pool, tennis court, basketball court, fitness center, indoor parking, and beautiful landscaped green areas ‚Äì ideal for families or those seeking a tranquil lifestyle. Despite its peaceful setting, the villa is within walking distance to the town center, markets, restaurants, beaches, and all daily essentials.

This fully furnished 5-bedroom villa is located in Kƒ±≈üla, the most elite district of Kalkan, just 200 meters from the sea. The property features a private swimming pool, spacious interiors, and an excellent location. It is suitable for mortgage, and currently used for touristic rentals during summer ‚Äì generating high rental income. Perfect for both investment and year-round living.

For sale: a 3+1 apartment with 85 m¬≤ net and 110 m¬≤ gross space, built in compliance with all modern regulations. A bright and modern 2+1 apartment for rent in the heart of Lara, just 50 meters from direct sea access! Perfect location for comfortable long-term living in Antalya. üìç Located in ≈ûirinyalƒ±, Lara ‚Äì Central and Walkable üõçÔ∏è Walking distance to Carrefour, Migros, ≈ûok, A101, cafes, restaurants, and all major beaches üè• 5 min walk to Medikal Hospital üè® 15 min walk to Akra Barut Hotel ‚úàÔ∏è 20 min drive to Antalya Airport üîπ Layout: 2 bedrooms + living room üîπ Area: 115 m¬≤ üîπ Kitchen: Open-plan (American style) üîπ Floor: 1st üîπ Bathroom: 1 with glass shower cabin üîπ Heating/Cooling: 2 Daikin air conditioners (18,000 BTU in living room, 12,000 BTU in master bedroom) üîπ Natural Gas Radiator Heating: Fully operational and installed üîπ Appliances: Samsung refrigerator Franke gas ceramic hob Samsung oven Samsung TV Washing machine üîπ Kitchenware: All necessary utensils included (plates, pots, forks, knives, bowls, etc.) üîπ Linens and Towels Provided üì∂ Internet, cable TV, hot water, and gas heating ‚Äî INCLUDED in the rent üí° Electricity & water are billed separately üí∞ Maintenance (aidat): 400 TL/month üìÖ Full 1-year rent must be paid upfront üìû Contact us now to arrange a viewing! description.en: SEA-VIEW 1+1 VILLA WITH LARGE TERRACE IN LUXURY CLUB PATARA HOLIDAY RESORT! We are proud to offer a fully renovated and stylishly furnished 1-bedroom villa located in the prestigious Club Patara Holiday Resort. üåä Direct sea view üè° Villa-style home with a spacious private terrace üõãÔ∏è Recently renovated with high-end furniture and materials üí´ Perfect for peaceful, high-quality living or vacation stays Full access to resort facilities included: ‚úÖ Swimming pools ‚úÖ Private beach ‚úÖ Restaurants & bars ‚úÖ Gym, tennis courts, spa, and more üìç A rare opportunity to live in one of the most exclusive seaside resorts in the region. üìû Contact us now for full details and to book a private tour.

MODERN 1+1 PRIVATE POOL VILLA NEAR KAS CENTER ‚Äì NATURE, PRIVACY & COMFORT! üìç Located just 10 minutes (approx. 10 km) from the heart of Ka≈ü, this modern 1-bedroom villa offers the perfect blend of privacy, nature, and luxury. üè° 1 Bedroom + Living Room üå≥ Surrounded by nature ‚Äì peaceful and quiet atmosphere üåû Bright living area with large sliding glass doors üõèÔ∏è Bedroom opens directly to the private pool üèä‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è 7x3m fully secluded private pool ‚Äì 100% privacy guaranteed üî• Private BBQ area in the garden ü™µ Natural wood details, modern bathroom with wide walk-in shower ‚ùÑÔ∏è Air-conditioning in both bedroom and living room üõãÔ∏è Fully furnished with luxury and functional furniture üçΩÔ∏è Full set of white goods and kitchen equipment + Boutique Complex with Shared Lounge & Social Area + Clean, Fresh Mountain Air ‚Äì Ideal for Summer Retreats + Suitable for Conservative Guests / Privacy-Oriented Families üìû Contact us for availability, pricing, and private viewing options!

This beautiful single-storey villa offers a peaceful and modern living experience, ideal for a couple or an individual seeking privacy and comfort. üìç Property Highlights: üè° 1 Bedroom / 1 Living Room (1+1) üìê 90 m¬≤ net / 110 m¬≤ gross indoor space üåø 250 m¬≤ private outdoor garden & terrace area üõãÔ∏è Fully furnished with modern design ‚ùÑÔ∏è Heating & Cooling: Air conditioners üçΩÔ∏è Open-plan kitchen (American style) üöø 1 spacious bathroom üöó Private parking: Open & closed options üè¢ Only 3 years old ‚òÄÔ∏è Single-floor living ‚Äì ideal for easy access Perfect for long-term stays in nature, yet close to town amenities. Private, secure, and ready to move in with just your suitcase. üìû Contact us today for availability, pricing, and viewing appointments!

Located in the lush, scenic grounds of prestigious Club Patara, this stylish and well-maintained 1+1 apartment offers stunning panoramic views of Kalkan. üõè 1 bedroom + en-suite bathroom üõã Spacious living room with open kitchen üõÅ 1 guest WC + 1 en-suite bathroom üè° Large private terrace with full Kalkan view üõã Sofa beds for up to 4 guests total ‚ùÑÔ∏è Cool stone interior + high-capacity air conditioning with air purifier üì∫ LED TV with cable, full kitchen equipment üß∫ Washing machine, dishwasher, vacuum cleaner üåø Walking distance to Palmiye Shuttle Point üìû Ideal for families or couples ‚Äì Contact now for seasonal or long-term rental options!

For sale: a modern 2+1 apartment with 85 m¬≤ gross area (80 m¬≤ net), located on the 2nd floor of a 4-storey building. This brand-new property features premium materials and high-quality finishes. It offers a closed kitchen, a spacious balcony, 1 bathroom, and is equipped with air-conditioning heating. The building includes an elevator and open parking space. A perfect choice for comfortable living in a central location.

This apartment offers an excellent central location: just 1‚Äì3 minutes‚Äô walking distance to the hospital, local market, main street, pharmacies, banks, post office, and shops; 3 minutes to the seaside, 10 minutes to the airport, 3 minutes to TerraCity Mall, and 5 minutes by car to Laura and Shemall malls. The property is equipped with air conditioning, solar water heating, an electric boiler, and panel radiators, with natural gas infrastructure already installed up to the door. Although facing northwest, the apartment enjoys sunlight until sunset. High-quality finishes include first-class ceramic flooring in wet areas, kitchen, hall, and corridors, while the living room and bedrooms feature premium parquet. The entrance door is a top-quality steel door. Layout: 2 bedrooms, living room, kitchen, bathroom, separate WC, laundry/storage room, and balcony. Monthly maintenance fee: 250 TL.

For sale in Meydan Kavagi: a spacious top-floor duplex apartment with an open and airy view. The lower level features a bright living room, a separate kitchen, a modern bathroom, and a balcony. The upper level includes two bedrooms, a second bathroom, and a south-facing terrace, perfect for enjoying evening relaxation.

For sale in Antalya, Muratpa≈üa ‚Äì Konuksever: a spacious fully furnished 3+1 apartment with 155 m¬≤ of living space. The property features two balconies (one enclosed with glass), natural gas system, an elevator, and a secure coded entrance. It is northwest-facing and includes a master bedroom with en-suite bathroom. The building offers a shelter and food storage room. Prime location: just 15 minutes‚Äô walking distance to MarkAntalya, near the Population Directorate, right next to Necati and Fatma D√∂len Primary School. The apartment is above Tahtakale Market, and the street hosts 5 supermarkets, 2 bakeries, a butcher, and a dried-fruit shop. A perfect choice for comfortable city living!

In G√ºzeloba neighborhood, close to the Tourism Road and Lara Beach, we offer for sale a residence permit‚Äìeligible apartment in a two-block complex. The site features 24/7 security with CCTV, central satellite system, coded and carded entry, outdoor swimming pool with children‚Äôs pool, gazebo, automatic irrigation and lighting, and professional landscaping. Location: 8 km to the airport, 1 km to Lara Beach, and within walking distance to schools, supermarkets (Migros, Bƒ∞M, A101, Tahtakale), malls, restaurants, and the hotel zone. The apartment is equipped with premium finishes: MOPA kitchen with imported granite countertop, lacquered doors, wardrobes, and bathroom cabinets, Vitra-Artema sanitary ware and fittings, LED ceiling lighting solutions, Winsa exterior joinery with mosquito nets and automatic shutters, video intercom, and fiber internet. Appliances include LG/York air conditioners, Buderus natural gas boiler, Silverline built-in set, Bosch refrigerator, washing machine, and dishwasher, plus a 55-inch LG TV. Furnished with Alfemo bedroom and living room sets, dining and balcony furniture, complete kitchenware, as well as Tefal iron and vacuum cleaner. A ready-to-move, high-standard home ideal for residence and investment.

For sale: an apartment with a 95 m¬≤ land share within a 4,000 m¬≤ residential complex, located within walking distance to Lara Beach. The property features 4 balconies, 2 toilets, and 2 bathrooms, offering a comfortable living space ideal for both residence and vacation.

For sale: a bright and spacious apartment with east, south, and west exposure, offering a sea view from the south and enjoying sunlight all day long. Located within walking distance to G√ºll√ºk and Konyaaltƒ± streets and the beach, in a clean family-friendly building. The apartment offers 110 m¬≤ of net living space with 3 bedrooms, a living room, and 2 bathrooms, with each bedroom suitable for a double bed and wardrobe. The building is 17 years old, officially inspected and licensed, with all architectural and technical renovations in the apartment fully completed and ready to move in. Natural gas is connected up to the door, and heating and air-conditioning infrastructure is ready for installation. All fixed furniture (kitchen, TV unit, hallway furniture, bathroom cabinets, laundry cabinet) is custom-made from MDF LAM, and the built-in kitchen appliances are installed. The building includes an elevator and a fire escape. Maintenance fee: 200 TL, with regular upkeep and cleaning.

For sale: a modern apartment featuring a terrace the size of the living room, 2 bedrooms, and 1 bathroom. The building includes a 10-person elevator reaching the basement level. Thanks to its prime location, the property is within walking distance to a research hospital, police station, primary, middle, and high schools, a health center, and all public transportation. The apartment offers dual WC/showers, electric shutters with remote control, central satellite system, and natural gas. Spacious and modern interior and exterior design with carefully planned architecture.

For sale: an apartment in a secure central Antalya complex featuring two Olympic swimming pools, a basketball court, tennis court, children‚Äôs playground, sports area, two active caf√©s, and an in-house market with delivery service. Each apartment includes a private parking space. The interior is furnished with lacquered furniture, and all materials, including electrical and plumbing systems, have been completely renovated to first-class standards.

For sale: an apartment featuring a walk-in wardrobe, laundry and storage room, glazed balcony, extra kitchen cabinets, and electric shutters. Natural gas (Daiken boiler) is installed. The complex offers an open parking area for 10 cars, 24/7 CCTV, hydrophore and water purification system, and a basement. Prime location: 10 minutes to MarkAntalya and √ñzdilek Mall, 15 minutes to Antalya Airport, 5 minutes to Atat√ºrk Hospital, 8 minutes to Antalya Training and Research Hospital and Tax Office, 10 minutes to the courthouse. Nearby: market 3 minutes, tram 3 minutes, G√ºll√ºk Street 6 minutes, Konyaaltƒ± Beaches 14 minutes, Atat√ºrk Park 12 minutes, Kalei√ßi (Old Town) 13 minutes.

For sale: a modern apartment located directly across from the main entrance of Akdeniz University in the city center, perfect for both investment and comfortable living. Within walking distance to hospitals, schools, and shopping centers, its central location ensures easy access to city amenities. The apartment is newly built with first-class materials, equipped with an elevator, natural gas, and solar hot water system.

For sale: a fully furnished 3+1 apartment with 280 m¬≤ gross (220 m¬≤ net) located on the 11th floor of an 11-storey building, 6‚Äì10 years old. The apartment features a closed kitchen, 3 bathrooms, a balcony, air conditioning, elevator, and open parking. Spacious and bright, it offers an ideal living space in a central location.

For sale: a 4+1 apartment with 160 m¬≤ gross (150 m¬≤ net) located on the 2nd floor of an 8-storey building, 6‚Äì10 years old. The apartment features an open-plan American-style kitchen, 2 bathrooms, a balcony, air conditioning, elevator, and open parking. Spacious and bright, ideal for family living.

For sale: a 3+1 apartment with 120 m¬≤ gross (110 m¬≤ net) located on the 2nd floor of a 4-storey building, 5 years old. The apartment features a closed kitchen, 2 bathrooms, a balcony, air conditioning, and elevator. Spacious and bright, ideal for family living.

For sale: a spacious and bright apartment with a walk-in closet (can be used as a guest bedroom) in a complex of 2 blocks with 16 apartments, 4 floors per block. The apartment features 2 foldable glazed balconies, electric shutters, laminate flooring, LED-lit suspended ceilings, and an elevator. Each apartment has its own parking space and storage room. The complex offers a sauna, gym, playroom, generator, and on-site caretaker. Prime location near shopping centers and amenities, with open views from all sides and sunlight throughout the day. A move-in ready, low-maintenance, clean, and airy apartment.

For sale: a fully furnished 3+1 duplex apartment with 180 m¬≤ gross (163 m¬≤ net), located on the lower second level of a 3-storey building. The apartment features an open-plan American-style kitchen, 3 bathrooms, a balcony, air conditioning, and open parking; no elevator. Privately owned, with panoramic views of the old town and the sea. Spacious, bright, and move-in ready.

For sale: a 1+1 apartment with 45 m¬≤ gross (40 m¬≤ net) located on the 9th floor of a 12-storey building with an elevator. The apartment features an open-plan American-style kitchen, 1 bathroom, a balcony, and air conditioning. Bright, airy, with panoramic views.

In addition, the property offers a beautiful garden with a variety of fruit trees. It is conveniently located just a 3-minute walk to local markets and a 5-minute walk to public transport. Pharmacies, restaurants, and a healthcare center are also within walking distance, providing maximum comfort and convenience for daily living.

For sale: a modern 1+1 apartment (open-plan kitchen-living room and one bedroom) with a total area of 53 m¬≤ (41 m¬≤ net), located on the 2nd floor. The apartment is finished to a high standard, equipped with air conditioning in every room, and features a fully fitted kitchen with built-in appliances (hob, oven, extractor fan, dishwasher, refrigerator). A unique advantage of this unit is the underfloor heating installed throughout the apartment (whereas the developer usually provides it only in the bathroom). The layout includes a spacious hallway with a built-in wardrobe and a stylish bathroom with a shower and water heater. The residential complex offers rich facilities: a 400 m¬≤ outdoor pool, children‚Äôs pool, heated jacuzzi, heated indoor pool, sauna, steam and salt rooms, fitness center, relaxation area, kids‚Äô playroom, bicycle parking, Wi-Fi, satellite TV, secure fenced territory with video surveillance and open parking. The sea is just 1200 m away. Demirta≈ü is an eco-friendly and quiet area with pine forests, barbecue zones by the river, a school within walking distance, and convenient local infrastructure. Gazipa≈üa Airport is only 15 km away. Nearby attractions include the ancient city of Syedra, Sapadere Canyon, and the unique natural phenomenon of Caretta turtles nesting on this coast from May to September.

We offer a stylish fully furnished 1+1 apartment in a modern residential complex with rich social facilities: indoor and outdoor swimming pools, fitness, sauna, landscaped garden, gazebos, children‚Äôs playground and park, parking, and a cozy TV lounge. The complex is located in a prestigious and quiet area, the building is only 2 years old, and the apartment is like brand new ‚Äî used only during summers. A perfect choice for comfortable living and leisure!

This pool-facing apartment stands out with its high-quality finishes and well-designed layout: modern kitchen cabinets, exterior thermal insulation, two spacious balconies, LED-lit ceilings, built-in wardrobe in the hallway, elevator access, secure steel entrance door, and a stylish bathroom with vanity, toilet, and shower cabin. All materials and workmanship are of first-class quality, ensuring both comfort and durability.

For sale: a fully renovated apartment with stunning views, located just a short walk from the sea. The residence offers rich amenities including an outdoor pool, children‚Äôs pool, landscaped garden, elevator, generator, 24/7 security, CCTV, concierge service, and a modern video intercom system. An ideal choice for comfortable living or a smart investment by the coast.

Spacious 3+1 duplex apartment on the upper floors, fully furnished and equipped with all appliances. The first level features a 37 m¬≤ open-plan kitchen and living room, a 12 m¬≤ master bedroom, bathroom with shower, storage under the stairs, and a 9 m¬≤ glazed balcony. The second level offers two bedrooms (16 m¬≤ and 19 m¬≤), a bathroom with shower, an open study area of 9.5 m¬≤, and a large 18 m¬≤ terrace with awning. The apartment comes with 4 inverter air conditioners, oven, gas stove, water heater, refrigerator, dishwasher, and washing machine. The building was constructed in 2019 and occupied since 2020. Located just 400 m (7 minutes on foot) from the sea, and 14 km from Alanya city center and Cleopatra Beach (30 minutes by bus or 15 minutes by taxi). The residence offers an outdoor swimming pool (May‚ÄìOctober), gazebo, and barbecue area.

For sale: a spacious 2+1 apartment in Alanya, Kestel, just 100 meters from the sea! Fully renovated in 2024, this modern apartment features 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, and 2 balconies. A perfect choice for comfortable living or investment in a prime seaside location.

For sale in Ka≈ü‚Äôs most prestigious area, the √áukurbaƒü Peninsula, this unique apartment embraces the stunning blue of the Mediterranean with breathtaking sea and Meis Island views. The property offers a 1+1 layout of 60 m¬≤ plus a 6 m¬≤ study, situated on a 1,521.26 m¬≤ plot with 1/8 ownership share. Featuring a spacious open-plan living room and kitchen, one bedroom, one bathroom, and a large balcony ideal for enjoying sunsets, this home combines modern design with a prime location. Sold fully furnished with elegant, minimalist furniture and high-quality appliances, the apartment is move-in or rental ready with no additional costs. Perfect for those seeking tranquility, comfort, and a valuable investment just 5 minutes from Ka≈ü center.

Every room is equipped with its own en-suite bathroom, and all rooms offer stunning sea views. The apartment comes fully furnished, featuring a jacuzzi, and is ready for immediate comfortable living without any extra costs. Perfect both for personal use and as an investment, as it can be rented out profitably during the summer season.

A unique villa with natural stone architecture and panoramic sea views! Situated on a 600 m¬≤ private plot with a living area of 225 m¬≤, the property offers 2 bedrooms, a cozy fireplace, and a spacious living area. Features include a heated indoor pool with jacuzzi, a 6√ó12 m outdoor pool, barbecue area, custom-designed kitchen and bathroom, and private parking. Located just 400 m from the sea. The property comes with a building registration certificate and an active electricity subscription. A perfect choice for those seeking comfort, privacy, and a prestigious lifestyle by the sea.

This villa, one of the most beautiful in the area, was built just 9 months ago and is located in Ak√∂r√º Village, Ka≈ü, 30 km from the center and the sea (30‚Äì35 minutes by car on winding roads). Offering breathtaking views of nature and the forest, it is ideal for families seeking privacy. With 204 m¬≤ of living space and 3 bedrooms, the villa can comfortably accommodate three families at once. Currently registered as agricultural land, the property is included in the officially approved village zoning plan, meaning it will soon gain full residential villa status, significantly increasing its value. The villa has a registered address, electricity and water subscriptions. Built with a stone-and-wood concept, it features stone walls, garden walls, and flooring. The property includes a 48 m¬≤ stone-finished swimming pool, gazebos by the pool and barbecue area, open parking, a children‚Äôs playground with a ball pit and electric ride-on car, poolside safety features, a security camera system, and solar water heating.

The villa is located right by the Fethiye‚ÄìKa≈ü road and has been built as a 4+1 property with a private swimming pool. The total living area is 400 m¬≤, while the land size is 600 m¬≤. Designed in a blend of Bohemian and Scandinavian architectural styles, the villa offers a unique combination of comfort and modern elegance.

Our villa is built on a 500 m¬≤ plot with its own private garden and is located within a secure residential complex. The villa is offered unfurnished. For detailed information, please contact us. A distinctive feature of this property is its self-sufficiency in electricity through solar energy. The complex includes a swimming pool, and residents also benefit from a private beach on the coast.

For rent: fully furnished detached villa located in Antalya‚Äôs prestigious Ermenek villa district. The property sits on a 400 m¬≤ plot and features a private swimming pool, closed garage, and complete privacy. Offered fully furnished and ready for comfortable living.

For rent: a cozy 2+1 apartment with 100 m¬≤ gross area (90 m¬≤ net), located on the 2nd floor of a 3-storey building; featuring an open-plan American style kitchen, air conditioning, and one bathroom ‚Äî an ideal choice for comfortable living in a peaceful setting.

For rent: a fully furnished and recently renovated 2+1 apartment with 90 m¬≤ gross area (85 m¬≤ net), located on the 1st floor of a 3-storey building; featuring an open-plan American style kitchen, air conditioning, one bathroom, and a balcony ‚Äî a perfect option for comfortable living.

For sale: a newly built 5+1 villa with 240 m¬≤ gross and 190 m¬≤ net living area, spread over 3 floors. Featuring an open-plan American style kitchen, 2 bathrooms, and air-conditioning heating system. Ready to move in, offering modern design and spacious comfortable living.

Located in G√ºzeloba Neighborhood, just a short walking distance from the sea, this semi-detached ultra-luxury villa stands out with its exclusive design, modern architecture, and private pool. Offering both comfort and elegance, it presents a unique opportunity for luxurious living as well as a valuable investment.
